password.INVALID: Password must have at least 6 characters

DATE_OF_BIRTH_INVALID_TOO_OLD: Date of Birth cannot be more than 100 years ago
DATE_OF_BIRTH_INVALID_FUTURE: Date of Birth cannot be in the future

home.WELCOME: Welcome to the Healthcare Management App
home.SUB_TITLE: Your one-stop solution for managing healthcare appointments and records.
home.FEATURE1: Access our AI assistant to detect diseases
home.FEATURE2: Book and manage appointments with ease
home.FEATURE3: Access your medical records anytime, anywhere

symptom-checker.TITLE: Medical Symptom Checker
symptom-checker.DESCRIPTION: Select the symptoms you are experiencing from the list below to receive a prediction for possible medical conditions.

appointment-form.END_TIME_AFTER_START_TIME: End time must be after start time
appointment-form.DATE_INVALID_PAST: Date cannot be in the past
appointment-form.ADDITIONAL_NOTES_INVALID_SIZE: Additional notes must be less than 500 characters

forgot-password.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
forgot-password.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Please check your email for the password reset link.

reset-password.PASSWORD_INVALID: Password must have at least 6 characters

landing-page.SUB_HEADER: A cutting-edge system for managing patient records, appointments, and predicting health risks using AI.

MANAGE_RECORDS.TITLE: Manage Records
MANAGE_RECORDS.DESCRIPTION: Efficiently handle patient data and appointments.

PREDICT_HEALTH_RISKS.TITLE: Predict Health Risks
PREDICT_HEALTH_RISKS.DESCRIPTION: Use AI to predict potential health issues.

SECURE_ACCESS.TITLE: Secure Access
SECURE_ACCESS.DESCRIPTION: Ensure data privacy with robust authentication.
